sections.heading: officers; other compensation from state; prohibition
sections.text: No officer whose salary is fixed by sections 84-608, 84-721, and 84-723 shall receive any compensation from the State of Nebraska other than the salary as fixed by sections 84-608, 84-721, and 84-723.SourceLaws 1957, c. 397, ยง 3, p. 1363.
